info.title: Homassy API
info.description: Home storage management system API - Manage products, inventory, shopping lists, and family sharing.

post.summary: Requests a verification code to be sent to the user's email address.
Verifies the email verification code and returns authentication tokens.

Refreshes the access token using a valid refresh token.
This endpoint accepts EXPIRED access tokens and validates them for user identification only.
The refresh token must still be valid and belong to the user from the access token.
Logs out the current user and invalidates their refresh token.

get.summary: Gets the current authenticated user's information.

post.summary: Registers a new user account.

get.summary:
Gets all available error codes with their descriptions.
Error codes are grouped by category (e.g., AUTH, USER, PRODUCT).
Gets error codes for a specific group.
Gets the current user's family information including members.

put.summary: Updates the current user's family information.

post.summary: Creates a new family for the current user.
Joins an existing family using an invite code.
Leaves the current family.
Uploads a new family picture.

get.summary: Basic health check endpoint. Returns overall application status.
Readiness probe endpoint. Checks if application is ready to receive traffic (database).
Liveness probe endpoint. Simple check to verify the application process is running.
Gets all shopping locations for the current user's family with pagination support.

post.summary: Creates a new shopping location.
Creates multiple shopping locations in a single request.

delete.summary: Deletes multiple shopping locations in a single request.

get.summary: Gets all storage locations for the current user's family with pagination support.

post.summary: Creates a new storage location.
Creates multiple storage locations in a single request.

delete.summary: Deletes multiple storage locations in a single request.

get.summary: Gets product information from Open Food Facts database by barcode.
Gets all products for the current user's family with pagination support.

post.summary: Creates a new product.

delete.summary: Deletes a product and all its inventory items.

post.summary: Toggles the favorite status of a product.

get.summary: Gets detailed information about a specific product including inventory items.
Gets detailed information about all products including inventory items with pagination support.

post.summary: Creates a new inventory item for a product.
Quickly adds an inventory item with minimal required information.
Records consumption of an inventory item.
Quickly adds multiple inventory items in a single request.
Moves inventory items to a different storage location.

delete.summary: Deletes multiple inventory items in a single request.

post.summary: Records consumption of multiple inventory items in a single request.
Creates multiple products in a single request.
Uploads and processes an image for a product.

delete.summary: Deletes the image of a product.

get.summary: Gets select values for a specific type (units, currencies, time zones, etc.).
Gets all shopping lists for the current user's family with pagination support.

post.summary: Creates a new shopping list.

get.summary: Gets detailed information about a specific shopping list including its items.

delete.summary: Deletes a shopping list and all its items.

post.summary: Creates a new item in a shopping list.

put.summary: Updates an existing shopping list item.

post.summary: Marks a shopping list item as purchased and creates a corresponding inventory item.
Creates multiple shopping list items in a single request.

delete.summary: Deletes multiple shopping list items in a single request.

post.summary: Marks multiple shopping list items as purchased and creates corresponding inventory items.

get.summary: Gets the current user's profile information.

put.summary: Updates the current user's settings and preferences.

post.summary: Uploads and processes a new profile picture for the current user.

delete.summary: Deletes the current user's profile picture.

get.summary: Gets the current user's notification preferences.

put.summary: Updates the current user's notification preferences.

get.summary: Gets the current API version information including build details.
